metadata.title: ATUM | Premium Digital Agency
metadata.description: ATUM transforms your ideas into exceptional digital experiences. Web development, mobile applications, artificial intelligence and automation.
metadata.keywords: digital agency, web development, mobile applications, AI, artificial intelligence, automation, UI/UX design, Paris

hero.subtitle: ATUM transforms your visions into digital realities. From concept to deployment, we bring your most ambitious projects to life with excellence and innovation.

services.title: Tailored solutions for every challenge
services.subtitle: Our multidisciplinary team masters the most advanced technologies to transform your ambitions into digital success.

web.title: Web Development
web.description: Showcase sites, complex web applications, e-commerce and SaaS platforms. Performant and scalable solutions with Next.js, React and the latest technologies.

mobile.title: Mobile Applications
mobile.description: Native and cross-platform applications for iOS and Android. Smooth and intuitive user experiences with React Native, Flutter and Swift.

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: Integration of generative AI, intelligent chatbots, cognitive automation and personalized recommendation systems.

automation.title: Automation
automation.description: Optimize your processes with custom automation solutions. Intelligent workflows, API integrations and custom scripts.

design.title: UI/UX Design
design.description: Elegant interfaces and memorable user experiences. Design systems, prototyping and digital visual identity.

consulting.title: Technical Consulting
consulting.description: Strategic guidance for your digital projects. Technical audit, software architecture and technology roadmap.

projects.title: Projects that make a difference
projects.subtitle: Discover how we have helped our clients achieve their goals with innovative digital solutions.

techStack.title: Cutting-edge technologies
techStack.subtitle: We use the best technologies to create performant, scalable and maintainable solutions.

about.title: Excellence at the service of your ambition
about.subtitle: ATUM is a passionate team that combines creativity, technical expertise and strategic vision to bring exceptional digital projects to life.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Founded with the conviction that digital can transform businesses, ATUM supports startups and large companies in their digital evolution. Our name, inspired by the Egyptian creator god, symbolizes our mission: to give birth to unique and impactful projects.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Every line of code, every pixel is designed with the greatest attention to detail.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly explore new technologies to offer cutting-edge solutions.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: Your success is our priority. We work hand in hand with our clients.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Clear communication, regular follow-up and full visibility on your projects' progress.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: Deadline respect, consistent quality and reactive support for a lasting relationship of trust.

discovery.title: Discovery
discovery.description: In-depth analysis of your needs, objectives and constraints to define a clear vision.

design.title: Design
design.description: UX/UI design and technical architecture for an optimal user experience.

development.title: Development
development.description: Agile development with iterative sprints and regular deliveries.

testing.title: Testing & QA
testing.description: Rigorous testing to ensure quality, performance and security.

launch.title: Launch
launch.description: Optimized deployment and support for a successful launch.

support.title: Support
support.description: Maintenance, evolutions and continuous technical support.

cta.title: Let's transform your vision into reality together
cta.subtitle: Let's discuss your project and discover how ATUM can support you towards digital success.

contact.title: Let's talk about your project
contact.subtitle: Fill out the form below or contact us directly. We will respond within 24 hours.

availability.title: Availability
availability.description: We are available Monday to Friday, 9am to 6pm. Response guaranteed within 24 hours.

message.label: Your message
message.placeholder: Describe your project, needs and objectives...

success.title: Message sent!
success.description: Thank you for your message. We will respond as soon as possible.

error.title: Error
error.description: An error occurred. Please try again or contact us directly.

footer.description: ATUM transforms your ideas into exceptional digital experiences. From concept to deployment, we bring your most ambitious projects to life.

legal.title: Legal Notice
legal.subtitle: Legal information and terms of use for the ATUM website.

editor.content:

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content (texts, images, videos, logos, icons) on this site is protected by copyright. Any reproduction, representation, modification or adaptation, in whole or in part, is strictly prohibited without prior authorization.

data.title: Data Protection
data.content: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the right to access, rectify and delete your personal data. To exercise this right, contact us at contact@atum.dev.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: This site uses cookies to improve your browsing experience. By continuing to browse this site, you accept the use of cookies.

404.title: Page not found
404.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

cookies.title: Cookie management
cookies.description: ATUM uses essential cookies for site functionality and, with your consent, Google Analytics cookies to measure traffic. Your data is anonymized.
cookies.duration: Your choice is stored for 13 months.

essential.title: Essential cookies
essential.description: Required for site functionality (session, language preferences, consent). Cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics cookies (Google Analytics)
analytics.description: Allow us to measure site traffic anonymously to improve our services.
